channel.title: Osx on Shirohida
channel.description: Recent content in Osx on Shirohida

item.title: Oracle, VirtualBox, Docker and Mac OS X
item.description: You might have heard of Docker by now. It’s a young but ambitious project that promises to package up your application as a portable and self-sufficient container ready to run in any environment. I already use Docker on my Linux boxes to spin several test instances of my web service. Let’s see if we can run it on Mac OS X.
